website_summaries.verdict: All ingredients sourced from U.S. farms and include U.S.D.A.-certified proteins.
pros: Recipe only contains four ingredients and has no grains as fillers, so it's helpful for dogs with food allergies
Includes only the best all-natural ingredients
Most dogs like the taste, so it works well as a treat or training reward
cons: If treat isn't used while it's fresh, it will become difficult to chew

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes but it is ground up chicken product, not jerky style
customer_reviews.text: The dog seems to like this just fine but I was expecting a true dried chicken product and instead got a dried ground chicken product. If the information that it is a reconstituted, dried meat product is in the description, I didn't find it. I do like the human grade quality, the ease of breaking pieces off--might be good for treat-training because you can make the pieces very small which you can't do with the whole meat, jerky-type product.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler509

customer_reviews.title: My little 14 year old red poodle Annie LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: Annie's favorite tasty treat. I don't over feed them to her but give her maybe one strip a day. I break that into little bits and feed them whenever she's just "good" outside or of she runs up to her food cabinet in the kitchen and taps on it to let me know its treat time. They smell delicious too, but I know I'd be in trouble if I started eating them in front of her! One other thing: Annie has a very sensitive stomach but she's never had any problem with these for the years she's been getting them. Every dog is different, but I'd highly recommend trying these based on our experience with them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT, and safe for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT, and safe for my dogs! Made in USA, and don't splinter like most "jerky" does, which can cause them to choke. My dogs LOVE these! I use them every time I leave the house so they are actually HAPPY I'm leaving! LOLOL! Thank you for a wonderful product! :O)
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Eikermann

customer_reviews.title: Buster's most favorite treat.  He is a Yorky/Silky Terrier mix.
customer_reviews.text: Our little dog is 14 years old and is very choosey about what he will eat. If it doesn't taste good or have the right texture, he will just refuse to eat the treat. The Full Moon chicken strips have good flavor (according to buster), have a texture that he can chew easily and they seem to satisfy him after every meal. Most jerky type treats are too hard in texture for him. This is the only treat that he consistently enjoys. Hope Full Moon continues to make these treats forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these natural human grade
customer_reviews.text: My dogs would eat these all day long I had to hide them in the freezer but they know the sound of the bag when it comes out. My main concern was I had three dogs with cancer so this was a natural product with no preservatives human grade, they're very addictive for the dogs I haven't tried them yet, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: AussiegirlIngridTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: As the animal stores have carried less and less options ...
customer_reviews.text: As the animal stores have carried less and less options at greater and greater prices, we've found this brand of human-grade treats to stand the test of time (and my dog's aging sensitive stomach). My dog loves these treats and seems to never tire of them, so we keep reordering!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great training treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really like these. And I am totally with the USA sourced and manufactured. As well human grade factor. Simple ingredients and you can pronounce all of them. LOL These are not a long term jerky chew. They break apart easily. So I use them for training and reward treats. I break off pieces myself and use the strip as a visual in training. I think they also make a jerky style, so more appropriate if you want a chewing experience.
customer_reviews.author: S. Keleher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Alternative to Jerky
customer_reviews.text: These treats are excellent. I have an older dog that has problems with her teeth. However, she absolutely loves the the very chewy chicken and pork jerky from Full Moon. I've been searching for an alternative and these chicken strips are perfect - she loves them and they are much easier for her to chew. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Something my picky eater consistently loves
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving these to my dogs, when I can find them, for years. I have bought them, often on sale, from Publix for a long time, but find the 12 oz packages on Amazon much more economical. This is his morning "breakfast," and he gets another for afternoon treat. (He's fed once a day, and he doesn't graze on dry food.) This routine keeps his weight in check (21 lbs for a cockapoo) and makes him happy. My cat also loves the tiny (TINY) piece I give her when I give him his treat, and she's also picky. I think these are A+.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Fry

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent treats, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to find these on Amazon because the store I was buying them from locally stopped selling them. I have little dogs and one especially has a sensitive stomach. These treats have never bothered her. Both of our dogs LOVE these treats and they are healthy for them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Lowrance

customer_reviews.title: Fur baby says , yum, yum!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome dog treat and what I love is it's made in the U.S. and Amazon has it for $2.00 less for the 12 oz. bag than Frys -so if you order 2 bags and free shipping as a "PRIME" member , that saves you $4.00 and that $4.00 in my pocket is what I look for. My fur baby simply loves these and I break off pieces as treats during the day or sher'd eat the whole bag if I let her .
customer_reviews.author: Miss Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Made in the USA from human grade chicken.
customer_reviews.text: I have this product on monthly order. It is made from human grade chicken and is grain free. I would recommend this product. The sticks are a little harder but not too hard for pets to chew. I break the sticks in smaller pieces to put in a chew toy for my small breed dog. My dog really likes these jerky strips and I like that they are made in the USA and from quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Sugar?
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, after buying these for a while. 2nd ingredient is Sugar. My view is that all sugar is bad for your dog, either based on natural wolf/dog diet or the fact that sweets can give your dog a taste for other sweets like xylitol (in candy and gum) and ethylene glycol, the anti-freeze found on every parking lot in the US. Both will kill your dog and sugar is a filler.
customer_reviews.author: mbon

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative
customer_reviews.text: This was a trial purchase and my dog didn’t take to it at first. She likes FullMoon treats and her favorite is pork jerky but I thought this could replace the chicken jerky she also is accustomed to.. after I had broken it into 3 pieces she seemed to enjoy it. I will buy it again. Don’t know about the flavor or scent so I marked them as a 3 just to fill the required field.
customer_reviews.author: Christine McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy these on Amazon! As soon as I opened the bag I knew something was wrong with these treats. The treats smelled horrid and they are much darker than normal. My dog was crying so bad for one I let him try a bite. I could barely break it in half like I always do and he could barely chew it. Something is very wrong with these treats. Amazon will not let you return them which is very disappointing. I always buy them from Target and this was my first time ordering them on Amazon. I will never order them on here again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to really like them
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very picky. We've had to change all his treats. These seem to be his new favorite. I did a lot of research trying to find treats with good quality ingredients and this seems to be the one my dog likes the best. Just note there is sugar in this so watch the calories.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: My yorkies love these chicken strips.
customer_reviews.text: My yorkies love these. I give each a half of one at 8:00 P.M. When it gets close to that time tbey will both lay close to where I am at and just stare at me to let me know it is about time for them. When I head toward the treats both spin around couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Csadams05

customer_reviews.title: Product is not edible.
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace product because it was hard as a rock and my dog could not eat it. I've been purchasing this product for several years without this problem. New product arrived. Same problem and the expiration is not until 2021. I will no longer be buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does have sugar
customer_reviews.text: My dogs Love these and since human grade I tried them. They are good but if your dog can’t have sugar. If I could relay to the company- take out the sugar or. Add a sugar free type.
customer_reviews.author: michele DiPinto

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The dogs went crazy but I have 5 dogs so could get very expensive but they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy E Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Pros n cons
customer_reviews.text: Amazon wants pros n cons or they cut your review. Pros: my dogs absolutely love these treats. They beg for them. They r usda organic. Cons: everytime I give them about a third, they throw everything in their stomach up.
customer_reviews.author: Too many books, never enuf time!

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves....0
customer_reviews.text: These are my puppy’s daily treat. She is super picky (annoying) and only seems to like treats that are human grade for some reason. But she LOVES these. We break them up into 3 pieces for her-she is 6 lb 5 months old.
customer_reviews.author: ASchmels

customer_reviews.title: Hard for my dog to chew
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua loves the jerky so i bought these strips, so hard i couldnt even break it into small pieces, she choked , and was sick on just a few pieces ,wont buy it again, maybe i just bought an old batch.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Ants
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this treat! But when I got it and opened the bag it was full of ANTS!!! It was horrible!!! I had to throw it out right away! I'll NEVER buy treats for my dogs again on Amazon! Not cool at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Way important treat only given at certain times
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients seem perfect to me - my dog LOVES these - she's pretty small so I break them in half. I only give them to her after she gets her teeth brushed, so it's a super special treat
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: use to be soft and fresh but now ...
customer_reviews.text: These arrive very fast and and use to be my dogs favorite treats. I’ve ordered these several times now and they use to arrive very fresh and soft, however the last two bags we have gotten have been hard and stale making it almost impossible for my chihuahuas for eat!! If this is how they arrive I won’t be ordering anymore .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large bag of strips
customer_reviews.text: The strips seem dried out and hard to portion out. Have always order smaller amounts before, will not order this large amount again. I feel sure the quality is still there but has been stored too long,
customer_reviews.author: mm331

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely picky dog. He will not eat most treats or dog food. It's been a battle finding something other than "people" food that he will eat. He absolutely loves these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good your family might want to eat them but NO they are for your dog.
customer_reviews.text: My breeder recommended these chicken strips and my dog dog loves them which is a big deal because she doesn't eat other treats. I used these for training and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: My picky little dog loves these things and they do not upset his stomach. The only thing that I can say bad about them is they smell really chickeny!
customer_reviews.author: tappintyper

customer_reviews.title: Human Grade Dog food Chicken strips
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old West Highland Terrier will only eat these for her treats. She loves them. Thank you for making such a great product. Kathryn Perry
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: My Pomeranian loves these! 🐕
customer_reviews.text: I originally got these as a Christmas gift for my dog from my aunt. My little pomeranian loves these so much I had to buy more and will continue doing so. I keep them in the fridge to keep them fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H.

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Full Moon does have some that are much better than these. These are not them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Treat for my Pet
customer_reviews.text: These treats are recommended by my vet and loved by my dog! I will continue to purchase these treats in various flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Best treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs favorite treats. He would go crazy with these treats. And the best part about it is human grade and made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Evey

customer_reviews.title: Pinot approves!!
customer_reviews.text: All three of my dogs love these and two of my boys are fussy. One extremely so and turns his nose up at most treats. You would think I was trying to poison him lol - but these get his seal of approval! Pinot definitely approves :)
customer_reviews.author: Simone W

customer_reviews.title: Our Chihuahua Loves These
customer_reviews.text: Our sweet girl fell in love with these treats quite a few years ago and they continue to be among her favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Jackson-Boone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dog smell and texture. Dog loves them and they are fresh and chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy G.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: I like that this dog treat is made in the USA. My dog likes this treat the best. I like that I can buy them online.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these, don’t even have to tell them to sit, they just do it! These are simply chicken jerky, easy delicious treat for the dogs and no side effects from additives that are unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: zugzwang18

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn't care for these
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure different dogs have different taste but my dog eats everything and definitely not interested in these.
customer_reviews.author: BRENT BEILSTEIN

customer_reviews.title: Dogs favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: This is my dogs’ favorite treat and is a product of the USA. Easy to break into smaller parts for my small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy2

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves these
customer_reviews.text: though I don't like to give them to her often but she wants them all the time, looking at me with those eye, so who could resist. lol she loves most Full Moon treats.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Best dog treats!
customer_reviews.text: 100% my dogs favorite treat! He's such a spoiled picky guy but as long as the brand is full moon and the flavor is chicken, he loves it! He tries to skip his dinner and go straight for a treat lol!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Conner

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA- 100% Chicken
customer_reviews.text: Great- my dog loves these. I have re ordered.made in USA. No additives. All chicken!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GPH

customer_reviews.title: The last two batches are stale very stale
customer_reviews.text: These dog treats are so hard that my dog can't eat them even after soaking them in hot water for a half hour.. They are very very stale do NOT buy..
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for my Boston
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting these for years. My Boston Terrier loves them. I love the natural ingredients. Gigi loves the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Paul & Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is a great treat for my dog and I will continue to purchase it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 small dogs and they love these treats. They come running when they hear the bag opening. No problems with small dogs and the products. They even smell fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Fresh quality and best price!
customer_reviews.text: I buy several treats from this brand. The quality is always good. My chihuahua loves them and this is one of his favorite flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Lynn Cicalla

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chicken!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love these! My older girl won't eat Nudges any more! There are less than 5 ingredients, and they smell like chicken. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Scarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Human-Grade Treats for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this brand for several years now & this is my third dog to decide it’s his favorite treat!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Anne Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Pretty healthy
customer_reviews.text: My dogs enjoy for a once in awhile snack instead of usual carrots and broccoli.
customer_reviews.author: laurie aselin

customer_reviews.title: Great treat
customer_reviews.text: My extremely picky dog love these. The smell is pretty unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: Old product recieved, not fresh, product is normally purchased locally which I am comparing this to.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Strong

customer_reviews.title: My very picky girl LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: I like that my picky treat eater never hesitates to gobble these up and I don’t worry about her choking like I do with the same brands chicken jerky
customer_reviews.author: frenchymom

customer_reviews.title: Not soft!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this product. I ordered these chicken strips because I read that they are soft to touch and chew. I did not feel that they were soft at all. I had to break them into small pieces for my stranded poodle and mini goldendoodle to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sottile

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Treat
customer_reviews.text: So fresh and smells amazing. My two dogs go crazy for these.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: consistant flavor etc
customer_reviews.text: This order was different from all other times, color,very hard,not fresh, not the same! Why?????
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Packages were hot had to discard the food.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but not through Amazon. The temps in Phoenix are in the 100s. The Full Moon treats I received were hot. Not sure how long they were sitting out side so had to through them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For chicken loving dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Both of our dogs love them and real chicken so safe.
customer_reviews.author: MandM

customer_reviews.title: Dogs and Cats love them!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best product in the world. All my pets love these, even my cat! Fast shipping Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: wendy Henry

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved them - No issues
customer_reviews.text: Dogs loved them No issues. These do kind of have a fishy smell to them
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: My dog, Zoey, loves them
customer_reviews.text: My Zoey is very particular about her food and treats and she loves these.
customer_reviews.author: rosesrpeachy

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog
customer_reviews.text: My cavapoo is over the moon with these full moon treats. He is usually very picky but he goes crazy for these treats without getting tired.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love it. Seems healthier than other snacks ks available.
customer_reviews.author: sgallatin

customer_reviews.title: great snack
customer_reviews.text: This is the only snack type food my pug will eat . I am happy to find it here and get the savings and auto ship available . It is hard to find it in our area .
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I feel good about giving my elderly dogs this brand. They love it and I love the natural human food grade selling point
customer_reviews.author: ganendal

customer_reviews.title: Dog mopes if he doesn't get one every evening.
customer_reviews.text: The dog loves these. He's quite used to getting one every evening after dinner, and mopes about quite sadly when we forget. They're so tasty that we have to break it into pieces or else he'll scarf it down.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn P

customer_reviews.title: Wholesome product. Tasty treat.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are grain intolerant and this perfect for them. They "ask" for these treats by going to the treat drawer and begging. Love my fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: My dog Chloe loves this stuff I would like to see this come in little small chip because she's a small dog and I have to break it up for her she's a chihuahua but we love it I have to buy all the time she recognizes the bag when it's up high when we go for a walk and come home she knows this is what she's going to get
customer_reviews.author: Deanna D Manigo

customer_reviews.title: Only treat my chihuahua likes
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only treat my chihuahua will eat. Plus it lasts forever because I give her small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella E.

customer_reviews.title: Love to give an all natural snack!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed alittle expensive, my big fur baby is worth a healthy snack!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these and my one dog is so picky that it's hard to find something she'll eat so yeah for full moon
customer_reviews.author: paige schultz

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them best company ever! Loves all their products
customer_reviews.text: My dog won’t eat any dog treats but he eats these

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats.
customer_reviews.text: Picky about treat eater. Not any more. Tug loves these treats.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful dog treats!
customer_reviews.text: These are great dog treats. I have a small dog so I break up each piece into smaller bites. I like that they are natural with no preservatives.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great treat for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a great treat for my dog, and the only one I buy. She will do anything I ask of her when she knows she will get her treat. They are made in the USA and I can't say enough positive things about these treats. I will continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Top grade dog treats
customer_reviews.text: Great product been given to my dog since she was a puppy

customer_reviews.title: Madison Loves this
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this and it is the only treat I give her.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Not for small puppies

customer_reviews.title: Good treat
customer_reviews.text: My 3 little dogs love these and they’re picky. I order it regularly!

customer_reviews.title: These are such great treats for my dog
customer_reviews.text: These are such great treats for my dog. Most treats give him bad breath but these don't and he loves them.

customer_reviews.title: I feel good that they are made in USA and Human Grade
customer_reviews.text: Whiskey Riveris a fussy hound....the only dog I know NOT motivated by food. He IS however, motivated by Full Moon Treats. I feel good that they are made in USA and Human Grade. He loves them!

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved!
customer_reviews.text: Sent these as an add on in my Mom’s package. Her dog loved them!

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Treat
customer_reviews.text: This I'd made with 100% human grade ingredients and I feel good about giving it to my dogs. They love it.

customer_reviews.title: My little dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats. They're easy for them to eat and I like that the ingredients are all things I have actually heard of before. They're not "jerky like", like some treats which are hard for my small dogs to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Likeaboss

customer_reviews.title: The dogs appreciate that I don't eat the chicken strips
customer_reviews.text: The dogs just love it. As soon as it gets dark outside, the dogs raise a fuss to get in their kennels because they know that a chicken strip is coming. Putting the dogs to bed is no fuss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our Golden doodle puppy just lovers these and is always jumping around when we bring them out.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: MY DOGS LOVE THESE!! THE DELIVERY DRIVER PROVIDED EXCELLENT SERVICE, AND THE DELIVERY WAS VERY FAST!!

customer_reviews.title: My dog‘s favorite treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. They are his favorite onesr

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Are CRAZY for these.
customer_reviews.text: If my dogs could just have these everyday instead of their regular feedings, they would eat it. They LOVE these treats. I have to really limit them.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A. Elliott

product_meta.title: Full Moon All Natural Human Grade Dog Treats, Chicken Strips
product_meta.description: Style:Chicken Strips| Size:12 OunceFull Moon Chicken Strips are made from USDA-certified, all natural, white meat, chicken breast sourced from family farms right here in the USA. Each piece is slow cooked in our ovens to bring out the rich, hearty flavors your dog loves. Our chicken strips are grain free so you know there are no fillers like corn, wheat or soy.
feature_bullets: Cage-Free Chicken Farm-Raised In The Usa
